headline: Carry Traders Ramp Up Bets in Emerging Markets as Fed Cuts Loom
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Carry trade is making a comeback among emerging market investors as bets the Federal Reserve’s will kick off interest-rate cuts next month weaken the dollar and fuel appetite for high-yielding currencies.
